name: Bumper Car Mania
description:
Enjoy the thrill of bumper cars on your iPhone or iPad. Lean the device to speed up, slow down, backup, and steer.

Four different types of gameplay:
- normal rink with barrier down the middle,
- open rink without center barrier,
- sumo-style (knock opponents out of playing area),
- soccer (requires playing online).

Play against AI cars or go head-to-head online against an invited opponent.

Optionally shares your accomplishments via email, instant messaging, or social media.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone X displays.

Game is multiplayer and multi-platform, supporting most popular smartphones, tablets, and computers.

Editor Picked by Best10App.com
